## WsClient.request() method

Send requests to the connected websocket.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
request<Req, Res>(request: Req): Promise<Res>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | Req | The request to send over the websocket. |

<b>Returns:</b>
